title: Lazarus Group uses KandyKorn macOS malware for crypto theft
description:

Another day, another malware operation by the infamous Lazarus group targeting blockchain engineers and crypto users.

title: Microsoft’s Secure Future Initiative Boosts Cybersecurity Against Advanced Attacks
